message: Dear Bob, I am pleased to offer you our premium product at a special introductory price of $950,000. This exceptional offer is tailored to recognize your esteemed position in the market and aligns closely with the value you see in the product. I look forward to your consideration.

Alice, thank you for the offer. While I appreciate your consideration, $950,000 is still above my budget.  I'm confident this product is valuable, but I'm only able to offer $850,000 at this time. Let's see if we can find a mutually agreeable price.

Thank you for your prompt response, Bob. I understand your current budget constraints. In light of this, I am willing to consider a revised offer of $900,000 for our premium product. I believe this price strikes a balance between recognizing the value you place on the product and accommodating your financial considerations. I look forward to your response.
Alice, I appreciate you coming down on the price.  $900,000 is still a bit high for me.  I'm prepared to offer $875,000. This is a serious offer, and I hope we can find common ground.

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. Considering the value of the product and your interest, I am willing to accept an offer of $890,000. I believe this price reflects a fair compromise while still allowing us to meet. I look forward to your confirmation.
